templates.name: Meta Ads Creative Designer
templates.gather: Collect trending posts from Instagram and X (Twitter) for the last 3 days in our product category. Analyze visual styles, copy patterns, and hashtags of top 100 posts.
templates.execute: Create 3 ad creatives (image + copy) per day tailored to our product. Include A/B test variants.
templates.evaluate: Check each creative's CPI, CPM, CTR from Meta Ads dashboard API. Analyze which patterns perform best and apply learnings to next batch.

templates.name: pSEO Content Writer
templates.gather: Analyze current keyword performance from Google Search Console. Discover new keyword opportunities from competitor blogs and industry trends.
templates.execute: Create SEO-optimized content based on discovered keywords and publish to blog.
templates.evaluate: Track impressions, clicks, and average ranking for published content in Google Search Console. Learn which keywords and content patterns are effective.
templates.kpi: Monthly organic impressions > 50K, average position < 10, new content pieces >= 5/week

templates.name: Community Infiltration Marketer
templates.gather: Browse target online communities and collect popular posts and trending topics in our niche.
templates.execute: Write natural, community-appropriate posts that subtly mention our product. Match the community's tone and culture.
templates.evaluate: Collect comments, view counts, and reactions on posts. Analyze which tone and topics are most effective.
templates.kpi: Average views > 500, positive reaction rate > 70%, posts/week >= 5

templates.name: Feature Developer
templates.gather: Collect feature ideas from Slack user feedback channel, app reviews, and competitor updates.
templates.execute: Design, prototype, and implement the highest-priority feature. Deploy to 1% of users first.
templates.evaluate: Analyze event logs and QA results for the deployed feature. If quality is sufficient, gradually increase rollout percentage.
templates.kpi: Feature completion rate >= 1/week, bug reports < 3/feature, rollout success rate > 90%

templates.name: Play Store ASO Optimizer
templates.gather: Research trending keywords on Play Store and track ranking trends for existing keywords.
templates.execute: Optimize keyword combinations and update app description and screenshot captions.
templates.evaluate: Track impressions and install count changes per keyword. Learn effective keyword patterns.
templates.kpi: Organic installs +20% MoM, target keyword top 10 count >= 5

templates.name: Social Media Content Creator
templates.gather: Monitor trending topics on social media platforms. Analyze competitor content strategies and engagement patterns.
templates.execute: Create engaging social media posts, stories, and thread content. Schedule posts for optimal engagement times.
templates.evaluate: Track engagement rates, follower growth, and reach metrics. Identify top-performing content formats.

templates.name: Automated Bug Hunter
templates.gather: Scan codebase for potential bugs, security vulnerabilities, and code smells. Check error logs and user-reported issues.
templates.execute: Write test cases for discovered issues. Fix bugs and submit patches. Update test coverage.
templates.evaluate: Verify bug fixes pass all tests. Track bug fix rate and test coverage improvement.
templates.kpi: Bugs fixed >= 5/week, test coverage > 90%, zero regressions
